name: OR_LNLG_SRGSTF_TMS
description: This table contains the Surgical Staff Times information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line (ORM) record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STAFF_ST_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this staff member's start time.

columns.name: STAFF_ST_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: STAFF_ET_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this staff member's start time.

columns.name: STAFF_ET_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: STAFF_TIME_SOURCE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The source and status of the start and end time for the provider.
